verses.name: John 21:7
verses.text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter, It is the Lord. Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord, he girt his fisher’s coat unto him, (for he was naked,) and did cast himself into the sea.

verses.name: John 21:8
verses.text: And the other disciples came in a little ship; (for they were not far from land, but as it were two hundred cubits,) dragging the net with fishes.

verses.name: John 21:9
verses.text: As soon then as they were come to land, they saw a fire of coals there, and fish laid thereon, and bread.
